description: Convert INTERSECT subquery pattern to multiple EXISTS clauses for better join planning
Extract date filtering into a separate CTE to enable predicate pushdown and reduce scans
When multiple CTEs each perform GROUP BY + WINDOW (cumulative sum), then are joined with FULL OUTER JOIN followed by another WINDOW pass for NULL carry-forward: defer the WINDOW out of the CTEs, join
Push filters from outer query into CTEs/subqueries to reduce intermediate result sizes
Consolidate multiple subqueries scanning the same table into a single CTE with conditional aggregates
